text: Alice Joyce (October 1, 1890 â€“ October 9, 1955) was an American actress. She appeared in more than two hundred movies in the 1910s and 1920s. She starred mostly in silent movies. Those included The Green Goddess in 1923. She was born in Kansas City, Missouri. She died resulting from heart problems at age sixty-five in Hollywood, California. Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Kansas City, Missouri Category:1890 births Category:1955 deaths
title: Alice Joyce
